Instruction: 'Place diced potatoes in a large pot and cover with water.'
Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat to medium and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until potatoes are fork-tender.'
'Drain the potatoes and return them to the pot.'
Add butter, milk, salt, black pepper, and garlic powder to the pot.'
Using a potato masher, mash the potatoes until smooth and creamy.'
Adjust seasoning to taste, if necessary.'
